testsuite.name: Below test cases are for project environments

testcase.name: WORKFLOW_TESTS - environment workFlow tests Below test cases are for project environments Environments-WF-001. In the yaml for a pipelineSource in project A environment DEV, specify a nodePool from project A environment PROD. Verify that pipelineSync fails.
testcase.classname: Environments-WF-001. In the yaml for a pipelineSource in project A environment DEV, specify a nodePool from project A environment PROD. Verify that pipelineSync fails.

testcase.name: WORKFLOW_TESTS - environment workFlow tests Below test cases are for project environments Environments-WF-002. In the yaml for a pipelineSource in project A environment DEV, specify a nodePool from project A environment DEV. Verify that pipelineSync succeeds.
testcase.classname: Environments-WF-002. In the yaml for a pipelineSource in project A environment DEV, specify a nodePool from project A environment DEV. Verify that pipelineSync succeeds.

testcase.name: WORKFLOW_TESTS - environment workFlow tests Below test cases are for project environments Environments-WF-003. In the yaml for a pipelineSource in project A environment DEV, specify a nodePool from project B environment DEV. Verify that pipelineSync fails.
testcase.classname: Environments-WF-003. In the yaml for a pipelineSource in project A environment DEV, specify a nodePool from project B environment DEV. Verify that pipelineSync fails.

testcase.name: WORKFLOW_TESTS - environment workFlow tests Below test cases are for project environments Environments-WF-004. In the yaml for a pipelineSource in project A environment DEV, specify an integration from project A environment PROD. Verify that pipelineSync fails.
testcase.classname: Environments-WF-004. In the yaml for a pipelineSource in project A environment DEV, specify an integration from project A environment PROD. Verify that pipelineSync fails.

testcase.name: WORKFLOW_TESTS - environment workFlow tests Below test cases are for project environments Environments-WF-005. In the yaml for a pipelineSource in project A environment DEV, specify an integration from project A environment DEV. Verify that pipelineSync succeeds.
testcase.classname: Environments-WF-005. In the yaml for a pipelineSource in project A environment DEV, specify an integration from project A environment DEV. Verify that pipelineSync succeeds.

testcase.name: WORKFLOW_TESTS - environment workFlow tests Below test cases are for project environments Environments-WF-006. In the yaml for a pipelineSource in project A environment DEV, specify an integration from project B environment DEV. Verify that pipelineSync fails.
testcase.classname: Environments-WF-006. In the yaml for a pipelineSource in project A environment DEV, specify an integration from project B environment DEV. Verify that pipelineSync fails.

testcase.name: WORKFLOW_TESTS - environment workFlow tests Below test cases are for project environments Environments-WF-007. After a successful sync where integration and pipelineSource are in DEV environment, update the integration environment to PROD, then trigger a run in that pipelineSource. Verify that the run is created, but step fails state due to inability to access the integration.
testcase.classname: Environments-WF-007. After a successful sync where integration and pipelineSource are in DEV environment, update the integration environment to PROD, then trigger a run in that pipelineSource. Verify that the run is created, but step fails state due to inability to access the integration.

testcase.name: WORKFLOW_TESTS - environment workFlow tests Below test cases are for project environments Environments-WF-008. After a successful sync where nodePool and pipelineSource are in DEV environment, update the nodePool environment to PROD, then trigger a run in that pipelineSource. Verify that the run is created, but step fails state due to inability to access the nodePool.
testcase.classname: Environments-WF-008. After a successful sync where nodePool and pipelineSource are in DEV environment, update the nodePool environment to PROD, then trigger a run in that pipelineSource. Verify that the run is created, but step fails state due to inability to access the nodePool.

testcase.name: WORKFLOW_TESTS - environment workFlow tests Below test cases are for project environments Environments-WF-009. User runs a step in a non-default project pipeline in the DEV environment using a resource from another pipeline source that is in both DEV and PROD environments and has a DEV environment integration successfully.
testcase.classname: Environments-WF-009. User runs a step in a non-default project pipeline in the DEV environment using a resource from another pipeline source that is in both DEV and PROD environments and has a DEV environment integration successfully.

testcase.name: WORKFLOW_TESTS - environment workFlow tests Below test cases are for project environments Environments-WF-010. User tries to run a step in a non-default project pipeline in the DEV environment using a resource with a PROD environment integration and the step status is “error.”
testcase.classname: Environments-WF-010. User tries to run a step in a non-default project pipeline in the DEV environment using a resource with a PROD environment integration and the step status is “error.”

testcase.name: WORKFLOW_TESTS - environment workFlow tests Below test cases are for project environments Environments-7524-001. User tries to add a pipeline source in a non-default project in the DEV environment containing a step that uses a resource defined by another pipeline source in the PROD environment. Pipeline sync fails.
testcase.classname: Environments-7524-001. User tries to add a pipeline source in a non-default project in the DEV environment containing a step that uses a resource defined by another pipeline source in the PROD environment. Pipeline sync fails.

testcase.name: WORKFLOW_TESTS - environment workFlow tests Below test cases are for project environments Environments-7524-002. User tries to add a pipeline source in a non-default project in the PROD environment containing a step that uses a resource defined by another pipeline source in the DEV environment. Pipeline sync fails.
testcase.classname: Environments-7524-002. User tries to add a pipeline source in a non-default project in the PROD environment containing a step that uses a resource defined by another pipeline source in the DEV environment. Pipeline sync fails.

testcase.name: WORKFLOW_TESTS - environment workFlow tests Below test cases are for project environments Environments-7524-004. User tries to add a pipeline source in a non-default project in the DEV environment containing a step that uses a resource defined by another pipeline source also in the DEV environment. Pipeline sync succeeds.
testcase.classname: Environments-7524-004. User tries to add a pipeline source in a non-default project in the DEV environment containing a step that uses a resource defined by another pipeline source also in the DEV environment. Pipeline sync succeeds.
